questions.question: This term refers to the practice of using science and technology to enhance the capabilities of the human body.
This type of biohacking involves implanting electronic devices into the body to enhance sensory perception.
This term refers to the practice of using genetic engineering techniques to modify the human genome.
This type of biohacking involves using nootropic supplements to enhance cognitive function.
This term refers to the practice of using wearable devices to monitor and optimize health and fitness.
